org.modelio.api.audit

Interface IAuditService


  • public interface IAuditService
    Audit services.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void audit(MObject element)
      Post 'element' in the audit check queue.
      boolean check(ITransaction transaction)
      Launch the core checker on all elements created and modified in a transaction.
      boolean check(MObject element)
      Launch the core checker on 'element'.

    • Method Detail

      • check

        boolean check(MObject element)
        Launch the core checker on 'element'.
        Parameters:
        element - The element to audit.
        Returns:
        true if the check does detect blocking error and false otherwise.

      • audit

        void audit(MObject element)
        Post 'element' in the audit check queue. The Element will be audited asynchronously by the Audit system and results posted in the audit results view.
        Parameters:
        element - The element to audit

      • check

        boolean check(ITransaction transaction)
        Launch the core checker on all elements created and modified in a transaction.
        Parameters:
        element - The transaction to audit.
        Returns:
        true if the check does detect blocking error and false otherwise.
